post:
Magento is an open source & enterprise e-commerce application that can be incorporated with the latest technology of vLite powered Linux VPS servers. We allow you to install Magento through Shell or administrative access on your virtual machine. You can also install various scripts, and custom software or applications. Furthermore, we at bodHOST offer a free installation of Magento with VPS hosting services.

Also don’t forget to avail a 50% discount on the 1st Month Invoice (Coupon Code: VPSCloud50) or 25% discount on Annual payment (Coupon Code: VPSCloud25).
